sentences.en: Beneath this, on the mantelshelf, is displayed a collec-tion of seventeenth-century tulip vases.
sentences.cn: 下面的壁炉架上陈列的是一批17世纪的郁金香花瓶。

sentences.en: But in the course of history, we settled beginning in the sixteenth and seventeenth century, down into just two patterns: what we call the major pattern and the minor pattern.
sentences.cn: 但在历史的发展过程中,在十六到十七世纪期间,人们最终确定了下列两种模式,我们称之为大调模式和小调模式

sentences.en: Girls used to put their hair up on their seventeenth birthdays.
sentences.cn: 过去的姑娘17岁生日时就把头发束起来.

sentences.en: Her reign lapped over into the seventeenth century.
In the seventeenth century, a Thai king trained 20,000 elephants for battle.
sentences.cn: 在十七世纪, 泰国国王为战争训练了两万头大象.

sentences.en: In the UK, too, religion seems to be generating an animosity not seen since the seventeenth century.
sentences.cn: 在英国也是同样，似乎自从十七世纪之后，信仰就不再产生憎恨和仇视了一般。

sentences.en: It happened on January the seventeenth.
On the seventeenth , to all appearance, the cloud passed away again.
sentences.cn: 十七日, 乌云总算又吹散了.

sentences.en: She gave birth to Annabel just after her seventeenth birthday.
sentences.cn: 她17岁生日刚过便生下了安娜贝尔。

sentences.en: Some of the seventeenth - century geometers undertook to answer these questions.
sentences.cn: 十七世纪的一些几何学者就开始寻找这些问题的答案.

sentences.en: The bones were "mislaid" during the seventeenth-century restorations.
sentences.cn: 这些骨头在17世纪的修复工作中被“放错了位置”。

sentences.en: The cabinets display seventeenth-century blue-and-white porcelain.
sentences.cn: 展柜中陈列着17世纪的青花瓷。

sentences.en: the enclosure of common land in the seventeenth century
The modern poets have gone back to the fanciful poems of the metaphysical poets of the seventeenth century for many of their images.
sentences.cn: 现代派诗人就其许多想象又回到了十七世纪极抽象派诗人的意象诗中.

sentences.en: The ornately carved doors were made in the seventeenth century.
sentences.cn: 那些雕饰精美的门制于17世纪。

sentences.en: The reign of Queen Elizabeth lapped over into the seventeenth century.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白王朝延至17世纪.

sentences.en: The seventeenth to Hezir, the eighteenth to Aphses.
sentences.cn: 第十七是希悉，第十八是哈辟悉。

sentences.en: These clubs began as coffeehouses in the seventeenth century.
sentences.cn: 这些夜总会在17世纪时原来是咖啡馆.

sentences.en: Third was the development of an international state system in Europe in the seventeenth century and its spread and adoption by nations on every continent.
sentences.cn: 再次就是公元十七世纪欧洲各国国家体制的变化发展以及它的广泛传播并被各大洲的国家所借鉴。

words.tran_cn: 十七岁的；十七的，十七个的
第七十的；七十分之一的

trans.tran_cn: 第十七的，十七分之一的
第十七，月的第十七日，十七分之一
